1a1(nyi khri): (ka) @#/ ! /stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2(nyi khri): (黃) 第二般若兩萬五千頌第一部
1b1(nyi khri): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa bing sha ti sA ha sri kA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/ shes
1b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ dum po dang po/ bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas
1b3(nyi khri): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
1b4(nyi khri): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa la/ dge slong lnga stong
1b5(nyi khri): tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag
1b6(nyi khri): pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes
1b7(nyi khri): rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/
1b8(nyi khri): khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag
2a1(nyi khri): pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa
2a2(nyi khri): dga' bo'o/ /dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
2a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos
2a4(nyi khri): thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/
2a5(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin du ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa
2a6(nyi khri): med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ grags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs
2a7(nyi khri): su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non
2a8(nyi khri): pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/
2b1(nyi khri): sngon du smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang
2b2(nyi khri): ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i
2b3(nyi khri): grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba
2b4(nyi khri): la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas
2b5(nyi khri): gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin du thob pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la
2b6(nyi khri): mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba kun du sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams
2b7(nyi khri): cad spangs pa/ las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/ chos
2b8(nyi khri): kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jig pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig
3a1(nyi khri): rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa
3a2(nyi khri): la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/ sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/
3a3(nyi khri): yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen snying po dang / rin
3a4(nyi khri): chen byin pa dang / ded dpon dam pa dang / skyes bus byin dang / skyob sbed dang / chu bdag lha dang dbang pos byin dang / bzang po'i stobs dang / blo gros dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel ba dang / blo gros mtha'
3a5(nyi khri): yas dang / don yod mthong ba dang / sgrib med blo gros dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang / mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / mi gtong brtson pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po
3a6(nyi khri): dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros dpe med pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya
3a7(nyi khri): dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / snying rje cher sems dang / rgyan chen po dang / rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub
3a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo dkrung
3b1(nyi khri): bcas te bzhugs so/ /de na bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag
3b2(nyi khri): go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/ /de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/
3b3(nyi khri): de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / /zhabs gnyis kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug
3b4(nyi khri): bcu byung ngo / /zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang / zhabs byin pa gnyis dang / zhabs pus mo gnyis dang / zhabs brla gnyis dang / sku sta zur gnyis dang / sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / sku rtsib logs gnyis dang / thugs ka'i skyes bu
3b5(nyi khri): chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / /phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / /de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis
3b6(nyi khri): dang / sku phrag pa gnyis dang / mgur dang / tshems mche ba bzhi dang / tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan gnyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / steng gi spyi gtsug dang / zhal
3b7(nyi khri): gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu po de dag thams cad kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos
3b8(nyi khri): khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs
4a1(nyi khri): su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang
4a2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab
4a3(nyi khri): par byas so/ /shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su
4a4(nyi khri): phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
4a5(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten
4a6(nyi khri): gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang
4a7(nyi khri): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas
4a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /ljags kyi dbang po de
4b1(nyi khri): las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ mdab ma stong dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa/
4b2(nyi khri): blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di
4b3(nyi khri): lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan
4b4(nyi khri): pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
4b5(nyi khri): du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
4b6(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin/ seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
4b7(nyi khri): mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun
4b8(nyi khri): tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go/ /rab tu ldeg go/ /kun du ldeg go/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun du shig shig go/ /
5a1(nyi khri): shar mtho na ni nub dma'/ nub mtho na ni shar dma'/ byang mtho na ni lho dma'/ lho mtho na ni byang dma'/ mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems
5a2(nyi khri): can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
5a3(nyi khri): rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang / mi dang skal pa mnyam par
5a4(nyi khri): skyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /
5a5(nyi khri): de nas lha de dag dang / mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon kyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom
5a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
5a7(nyi khri): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems
5a8(nyi khri): can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal
5b1(nyi khri): ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa
5b2(nyi khri): de dag / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
5b3(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
5b4(nyi khri): thams cad kyang / mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par
5b5(nyi khri): gyur to/ /gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/ /skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med
5b6(nyi khri): par gyur to/ /lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur te/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa
5b7(nyi khri): rnams kyang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na pha dang ma dang / phu nu dang sring mo dang mdza' ba dang gnyen pa dang /
5b8(nyi khri): grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/
6a1(nyi khri): mi dge ba'i rtogs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba
6a2(nyi khri): de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/ /zhi ba ni dge ba'o/ /dul ba ni dge ba'o/ /sdom pa ni dge ba'o/ /dben
6a3(nyi khri): pa ni dge ba'o/ /bag byed pa ni dge ba'o/ /byams pa ni dge ba'o/ /snying rje ni dge ba'o/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ni dge ba'o/ /srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba 'di ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de'i
6a4(nyi khri): tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/ zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong
6a5(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/
6a6(nyi khri): gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
6a7(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
6a8(nyi khri): snyed zil gyi mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs
6b1(nyi khri): mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs
6b2(nyi khri): so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non
6b3(nyi khri): par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
6b4(nyi khri): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes
6b5(nyi khri): shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to/ /de nas stong gsum
6b6(nyi khri): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /
6b7(nyi khri): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu
6b8(nyi khri): dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang /
7a1(nyi khri): na li na dang / sau gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ge sar dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
7a2(nyi khri): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug spos dang / ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan d+hi dang / me tog ge sar dang / ta ma
7a3(nyi khri): la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
7a4(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
7a5(nyi khri): la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sogs pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
7a6(nyi khri): byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du reng nge gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de
7a7(nyi khri): las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/ /mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/ /rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/ /me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin
7a8(nyi khri): du mdzes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin du mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar
7b1(nyi khri): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi
7b2(nyi khri): phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes
7b3(nyi khri): pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba glang spyod dang / shar gyi
7b4(nyi khri): lus 'phags po dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong
7b5(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing
7b6(nyi khri): chos ston to snyam mo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs
7b7(nyi khri): dang lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /'od des stong gsum gyi
7b8(nyi khri): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
8a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed
8a2(nyi khri): 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub
8a3(nyi khri): sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang
8a4(nyi khri): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
8a5(nyi khri): thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/
8a6(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
8a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang
8a8(nyi khri): ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas
8b1(nyi khri): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /
8b2(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas
8b3(nyi khri): 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
8b4(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /
8b5(nyi khri): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi
8b6(nyi khri): mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun
8b7(nyi khri): kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
8b8(nyi khri): gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung
9a1(nyi khri): ba la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
9a2(nyi khri): thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag
9a3(nyi khri): kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par
9a4(nyi khri): spyod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
9a5(nyi khri): 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/
9a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
9a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya
9a8(nyi khri): ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
9b1(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
9b2(nyi khri): chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi
9b3(nyi khri): mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
9b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
9b5(nyi khri): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par
9b6(nyi khri): gyur to/ /pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
9b7(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de
9b8(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /sti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig
10a1(nyi khri): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan
10a2(nyi khri): med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang
10a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan
10a4(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
10a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
10a6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
10a7(nyi khri): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems
10a8(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la
10b1(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing
10b2(nyi khri): bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab
10b3(nyi khri): tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
10b4(nyi khri): med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom
10b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan
10b6(nyi khri): nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
10b7(nyi khri): mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
10b8(nyi khri): chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
11a1(nyi khri): mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
11a2(nyi khri): du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang
11a3(nyi khri): phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/
11a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
11a5(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
11a6(nyi khri): rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong
11a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes
11a8(nyi khri): nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/
11b1(nyi khri): pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa
11b2(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
11b3(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /sti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
11b4(nyi khri): gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/
11b5(nyi khri): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug
11b6(nyi khri): 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
11b7(nyi khri): 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de
11b8(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
12a1(nyi khri): kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyis khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
12a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
12a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/
12a5(nyi khri): gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros
12a6(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu
12a7(nyi khri): las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi
12a8(nyi khri): mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
12b1(nyi khri): gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten
12b2(nyi khri): gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan
12b3(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /
12b4(nyi khri): rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs
12b5(nyi khri): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang sti stang du bya ba
12b6(nyi khri): dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na
12b7(nyi khri): ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan
12b8(nyi khri): 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/
13a1(nyi khri): zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od
13a2(nyi khri): 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/
13a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs
13a4(nyi khri): pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
13a5(nyi khri): tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
13a6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /sti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
13a7(nyi khri): 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems
13a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/
13b1(nyi khri): snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po
13b2(nyi khri): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin
13b3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka'
13b4(nyi khri): stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
13b5(nyi khri): rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal
13b6(nyi khri): bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
13b7(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa
13b8(nyi khri): rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la
14a1(nyi khri): bab par shes na song shig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can
14a2(nyi khri): 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma
14a3(nyi khri): mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang
14a4(nyi khri): pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub
14a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
14a6(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa
14a7(nyi khri): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos
14a8(nyi khri): dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang sti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
14b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
14b2(nyi khri): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
14b3(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam
14b4(nyi khri): zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
14b5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis
14b6(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan
14b7(nyi khri): pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su
14b8(nyi khri): 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du
15a1(nyi khri): byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan
15a2(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
15a3(nyi khri): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po
15a4(nyi khri): de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i
15a5(nyi khri): dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa
15a6(nyi khri): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
15a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
15a8(nyi khri): khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems
15b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge
15b2(nyi khri): 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de
15b3(nyi khri): blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par
15b4(nyi khri): 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig / //
15b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la/ pad mo rin po
15b6(nyi khri): che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun
15b7(nyi khri): mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
15b8(nyi khri): gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la bag yod par spyod cig /
16a1(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
16a2(nyi khri): rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan
16a3(nyi khri): pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs
16a4(nyi khri): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis
16a5(nyi khri): rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang sti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
16a6(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
16a7(nyi khri): par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/
16a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag
16b1(nyi khri): kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes
16b2(nyi khri): nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag
16b3(nyi khri): gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan
16b4(nyi khri): pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis
16b5(nyi khri): kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /sti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig
16b6(nyi khri): tu 'khod do/ /de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
16b7(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /
16b8(nyi khri): de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong
17a1(nyi khri): nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal
17a2(nyi khri): de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
17a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten
17a4(nyi khri): gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /
17a5(nyi khri): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
17a6(nyi khri): pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub
17a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta
17a8(nyi khri): ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
17b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
17b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog
17b3(nyi khri): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu
17b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems
17b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs
17b6(nyi khri): te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi
17b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur
17b8(nyi khri): stir bya ba dang sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
18a1(nyi khri): rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
18a2(nyi khri): lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/
18a3(nyi khri): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
18a4(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
18a5(nyi khri): rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor
18a6(nyi khri): to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos
18a7(nyi khri): ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs
18a8(nyi khri): su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /sti stang du
18b1(nyi khri): byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya
18b2(nyi khri): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
18b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang /
18b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
18b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin
18b6(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang
18b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
18b8(nyi khri): khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
19a1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad
19a2(nyi khri): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen
19a3(nyi khri): bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab
19a4(nyi khri): tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs
19a5(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi
19a6(nyi khri): mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bkur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma
19a7(nyi khri): mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil
19a8(nyi khri): 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi
19b1(nyi khri): khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba
19b3(nyi khri): dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong
19b4(nyi khri): ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang sti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub
19b5(nyi khri): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
19b6(nyi khri): zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
19b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog
19b8(nyi khri): bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
20a1(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
20a2(nyi khri): thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /
20a3(nyi khri): de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /
20a4(nyi khri): chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su
20a5(nyi khri): 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /sti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas
20a6(nyi khri): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
20a7(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas
20a8(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/
20b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gdugs dam pa gang na ba der stong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di
20b2(nyi khri): lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/
20b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
20b4(nyi khri): khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
20b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol
20b6(nyi khri): to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba
20b7(nyi khri): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu
20b8(nyi khri): thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
21a1(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa
21a2(nyi khri): stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/
21a3(nyi khri): sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la
21a4(nyi khri): mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
21a5(nyi khri): chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
21a6(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
21a7(nyi khri): dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng
21a8(nyi khri): ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang sti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems
21b1(nyi khri): dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
21b2(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
21b3(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod
21b4(nyi khri): dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das
21b5(nyi khri): la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
21b6(nyi khri): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par
21b7(nyi khri): khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur
21b8(nyi khri): pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i
22a1(nyi khri): rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /sti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas
22a2(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
22a3(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston
22a4(nyi khri): pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
22a5(nyi khri): blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
22a6(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin
22a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub
22a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
