146b8(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
147a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
147a2(nyi khri): rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
147a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
147a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do/ /de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
147a5(nyi khri): du phyin pa la spyod kyang / spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi spyod pa 'ang ma yin
147a6(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs
147a7(nyi khri): mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor
147a8(nyi khri): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i
147b1(nyi khri): rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do
147b2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod pa 'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa 'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
147b3(nyi khri): 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gal te sems
147b4(nyi khri): ma zhum/ kun tu ma zhum/ mi skrag /kun tu mi skrag /kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar
147b5(nyi khri): gyur par rig par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ gnyis su med gnyis su byar med do/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
147b6(nyi khri): kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod
147b7(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba'
147b8(nyi khri): zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang
148a1(nyi khri): yod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
148a2(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla
148a3(nyi khri): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
148a4(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
148a5(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla
148a6(nyi khri): ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyi
148a7(nyi khri): gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
148a8(nyi khri): nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i
148b1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshig bla dgas
148b2(nyi khri): la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
148b3(nyi khri): chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i
148b4(nyi khri): dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snrel zhi
148b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
148b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
148b7(nyi khri): yod do/ /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
148b8(nyi khri): yod do/ /glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
149a1(nyi khri): gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
149a2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i
149a3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
149a4(nyi khri): sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos
149a5(nyi khri): dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i
149a6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
149a7(nyi khri): yod do/ /yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
149a8(nyi khri): yod do/ /ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
149b1(nyi khri): yod do/ /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med par gnas
149b2(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya
149b3(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
149b4(nyi khri): nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes
149b5(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa
149b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
149b7(nyi khri): yod do/ /mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
149b8(nyi khri): yod do/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i
150a1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
150a2(nyi khri): yod do/ /'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od
150a3(nyi khri): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin
150a4(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
150a5(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /de bzhin nyid
150a6(nyi khri): la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar
150a7(nyi khri): gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang
150a8(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
150b1(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
150b2(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
150b3(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
150b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / bla na med
150b5(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
150b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ byang chub
150b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do/ /bdag
150b8(nyi khri): ni snyoms par 'jug go/ /bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/ /bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi rgyu'o/ /smras
151a1(nyi khri): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
151a2(nyi khri): kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang
151a3(nyi khri): gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge
151a4(nyi khri): 'dzin to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan
151a5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par
151a6(nyi khri): nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
151a7(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor
151a8(nyi khri): gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de
151b1(nyi khri): la rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ /'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/ byang chub
151b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ /'du shes su 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste
151b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do/ /ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'
151b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul
151b5(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas tshe
151b6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs
151b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
151b8(nyi khri): pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
152a1(nyi khri): pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
152a2(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs
152a3(nyi khri): kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan
152a4(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ /sems can dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang /
152a5(nyi khri): byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par
152a6(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /
152a7(nyi khri): shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol du phyin pa
152a8(nyi khri): rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
152b1(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
152b2(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
152b3(nyi khri): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba
152b4(nyi khri): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so/ /
152b5(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag
152b6(nyi khri): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub
152b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob
152b8(nyi khri): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang slob pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos
153a1(nyi khri): 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa
153a2(nyi khri): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir med ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa de la mchis pa zhes
153a3(nyi khri): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
153a4(nyi khri): par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
153a5(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /de la byis
153a6(nyi khri): pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/ srid pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing / 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i
153a7(nyi khri): mtha' gnyis la chags pas/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
153a8(nyi khri): la mngon par zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag
153b1(nyi khri): mi shes mi mthong ngo / /ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /
153b2(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo / /de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gang
153b3(nyi khri): nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin
153b4(nyi khri): no/ /de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar
153b5(nyi khri): gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes
153b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa ma yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhes na/
153b7(nyi khri): gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye
153b8(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar
154a1(nyi khri): la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam
154a2(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob
154a3(nyi khri): pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
154a4(nyi khri): du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par
154a5(nyi khri): zhen/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa
154a6(nyi khri): nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
154a7(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
154a8(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
154b1(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/
154b2(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
154b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/
154b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes
154b5(nyi khri): su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no/ /bsam
154b6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du
154b7(nyi khri): phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra
154b8(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
155a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /
155a2(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i
155a3(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug pa'o// //
155a4(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams
155a5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol
155a6(nyi khri): du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
155a7(nyi khri): 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la
155a8(nyi khri): bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan
155b1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/
155b2(nyi khri): tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
155b3(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam
155b4(nyi khri): 'am/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang
155b5(nyi khri): gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan
155b6(nyi khri): la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus
155b7(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i
155b8(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
156a1(nyi khri): tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
156a2(nyi khri): chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
156a3(nyi khri): 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
156a4(nyi khri): kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/
156a5(nyi khri): sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam
156a6(nyi khri): par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags/
156a7(nyi khri): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /
156a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so/ /bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma
156b1(nyi khri): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /
156b2(nyi khri): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig gi
156b3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
156b4(nyi khri): dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
156b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
156b6(nyi khri): ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
156b7(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
156b8(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /bcom ldan
157a1(nyi khri): 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan
157a2(nyi khri): 'das byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod
157a3(nyi khri): dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
157a4(nyi khri): mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur
157a5(nyi khri): ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
157a6(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
157a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad
157a8(nyi khri): kyi bar la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
157b1(nyi khri): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/
157b2(nyi khri): rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags
157b3(nyi khri): ba med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba
157b4(nyi khri): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
157b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /
157b6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
157b7(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing /
157b8(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub
158a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes
158a2(nyi khri): bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
158a3(nyi khri): ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis
158a4(nyi khri): so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
158a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
158a6(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
158a7(nyi khri): la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgra
158a8(nyi khri): brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/
158b1(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/
158b2(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes
158b3(nyi khri): pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug
158b4(nyi khri): go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab
158b5(nyi khri): 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni smig
158b6(nyi khri): rgyu lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
158b7(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
158b8(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sngang ba dang / skrag
159a1(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs
159a2(nyi khri): kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di
159a3(nyi khri): thos na mi 'jigs/ mi dngang mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
159a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
159a5(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
159a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
159a7(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
159a8(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba
159b1(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor
159b2(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs
159b3(nyi khri): so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar
159b4(nyi khri): rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs
159b5(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
159b6(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
159b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
159b8(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
160a1(nyi khri): shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /
160a2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med pa'i
160a3(nyi khri): rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

160a6(nyi khri): de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes

160b1(nyi khri): par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
160b2(nyi khri): la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni

160b4(nyi khri): can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan

160b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes
160b7(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa'
160b8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs/ mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
161a1(nyi khri): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /
161a2(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa

161a5(nyi khri): yid la byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par
161a6(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /
161a7(nyi khri): zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di ni
161a8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
161b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog
161b2(nyi khri): go/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
161b3(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
161b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
161b5(nyi khri): med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi gtong zhing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems
161b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs/ mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
161b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
161b8(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes
162a1(nyi khri): bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
162a2(nyi khri): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
162a3(nyi khri): par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
162a4(nyi khri): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang
162a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag
162a6(nyi khri): nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
162a7(nyi khri): yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
162a8(nyi khri): shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis/ mig stong pa ma yin gyis/ mig nyid kyang
162b1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid
162b2(nyi khri): kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
162b3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /
162b4(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi
162b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa
162b6(nyi khri): nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus
162b7(nyi khri): te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te
162b8(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
163a1(nyi khri): tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
163a2(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang
163a3(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dran
163a4(nyi khri): pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ngo
163a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
163a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur
163a7(nyi khri): ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi
163a8(nyi khri): 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
163b1(nyi khri): ni gang / de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
163b2(nyi khri): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
163b3(nyi khri): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
163b4(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
163b5(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
163b6(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang /
163b7(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i/ tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
163b8(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
164a1(nyi khri): gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
164a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi

164a4(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad

164a8(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

164b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub

164b8(nyi khri): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
