167a8(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
167b1(nyi khri): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
167b2(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
167b3(nyi khri): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
167b4(nyi khri): tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
167b5(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
167b6(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
167b7(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
167b8(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
168a1(nyi khri): ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te
168a2(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa
168a3(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
168a4(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
168a5(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te
168a6(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te
168a7(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
168a8(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
168b1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
168b2(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
168b3(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
168b4(nyi khri): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
168b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal
168b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
168b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
168b8(nyi khri): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal
169a1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi
169a2(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs
169a3(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
169a4(nyi khri): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes
169a5(nyi khri): gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi sngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
169a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par
169a7(nyi khri): 'gyur zhing / thabs mi mkhas ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
169a8(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing
169b1(nyi khri): dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa
169b2(nyi khri): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa des/ rlom sems su byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i
169b3(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
169b4(nyi khri): bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas
169b5(nyi khri): par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
169b6(nyi khri): gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
169b7(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa
169b8(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi
170a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed
170a2(nyi khri): do/ /mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya
170a3(nyi khri): bar yid la byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med
170a4(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos
170a5(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
170a6(nyi khri): gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg dang chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong
170a7(nyi khri): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yang yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de
170a8(nyi khri): yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
170b1(nyi khri): mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
170b2(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
170b3(nyi khri): pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med
170b4(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
170b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
170b6(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
170b7(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi
170b8(nyi khri): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar/ yid la byed cing /
171a1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa
171a2(nyi khri): nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus
171a3(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
171a4(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
171a5(nyi khri): tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
171a6(nyi khri): byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong
171a7(nyi khri): pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /sa'i khams
171a8(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
171b1(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par
171b2(nyi khri): shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
171b3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig
171b4(nyi khri): pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg
171b5(nyi khri): pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar
171b6(nyi khri): yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang
171b7(nyi khri): dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
171b8(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul
172a1(nyi khri): gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
172a2(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
172a3(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
172a4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs
172a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
172a6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
172a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing dngang la/ skrag par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan
172a8(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing / zlog par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan
172b1(nyi khri): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/
172b2(nyi khri): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di ni bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /bcang
172b3(nyi khri): bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o/ /zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por
172b4(nyi khri): rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
172b5(nyi khri): drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol du phyin pa drug las zlog cing / mos pa med par byed de rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig
172b6(nyi khri): bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
172b7(nyi khri): bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
172b8(nyi khri): bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su
173a1(nyi khri): bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gling gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa dag ston to/ /
173a2(nyi khri): 'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grog por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
173a3(nyi khri): yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa
173a4(nyi khri): yang ma yin khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so/ /zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
173a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad tu rigs kyi bu ni bdag
173a6(nyi khri): gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig
173a7(nyi khri): gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
173a8(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig
173b1(nyi khri): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus
173b2(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
173b3(nyi khri): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi
173b4(nyi khri): bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci

177a5(nyi khri): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
177a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
177a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
177a8(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
177b1(nyi khri): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
177b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
177b3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
177b4(nyi khri): gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i
177b5(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor
177b6(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
177b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
177b8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
178a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
178a2(nyi khri): la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
178a3(nyi khri): tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
178a4(nyi khri): chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
178a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
178a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
178a7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
178a8(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor
178b1(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin
178b2(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna
178b3(nyi khri): ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus gyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/
178b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
178b5(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
178b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
178b7(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid
178b8(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
179a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med
179a2(nyi khri): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
179a3(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la
179a4(nyi khri): gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
179a5(nyi khri): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
179a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
179a7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas
179a8(nyi khri): med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
179b1(nyi khri): don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
179b2(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
179b3(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
179b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang
179b5(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
179b6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
179b7(nyi khri): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
179b8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do/ /
180a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
180a2(nyi khri): na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la gnas med do/ /
180a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang
180a4(nyi khri): gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /
180a5(nyi khri): 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang gi mi dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs
180a6(nyi khri): 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs mi
180a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon
180a8(nyi khri): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa la
180b1(nyi khri): gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
180b2(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags
180b3(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
180b4(nyi khri): dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
180b5(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
180b6(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
180b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med
180b8(nyi khri): do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
181a1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin du rnam
181a2(nyi khri): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
181a3(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar du shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
181a4(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
181a5(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
181a6(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin
181a7(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir
181a8(nyi khri): bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po
181b1(nyi khri): dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor
181b2(nyi khri): ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
181b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
181b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi
181b5(nyi khri): gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
181b6(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
181b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la
181b8(nyi khri): 'khrug pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta
182a1(nyi khri): ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la/ shes rab 'chal ba'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
182a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
182a3(nyi khri): kyi rnam par grol ba la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
182a4(nyi khri): don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
182a5(nyi khri): ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta
182a6(nyi khri): ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
182a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
182a8(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang /
182b1(nyi khri): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /
182b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182b3(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
182b4(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
182b5(nyi khri): don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang
182b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la rtog pa med cing /
182b7(nyi khri): rnam par rtog pa med par yang rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang rnams kyi ma chags pa dang
182b8(nyi khri): mchis pa ma lags pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni gang rnams rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
183a1(nyi khri): chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma stan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma
183a2(nyi khri): byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang
183a3(nyi khri): chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
183a4(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes
183a5(nyi khri): pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /
183a6(nyi khri): nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par
183a7(nyi khri): rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i
183a8(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar
183b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran
183b2(nyi khri): pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba
183b3(nyi khri): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par
183b4(nyi khri): g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang /
183b5(nyi khri): 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom
183b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung ma
183b7(nyi khri): bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan
183b8(nyi khri): pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i
184a1(nyi khri): chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
184a2(nyi khri): shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par/ de ma yin par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
184a3(nyi khri): chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
184a4(nyi khri): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i
184a5(nyi khri): dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med
184a6(nyi khri): cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pa gzugs mthong ba
184a7(nyi khri): 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /
184a8(nyi khri): gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas
184b1(nyi khri): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes
184b2(nyi khri): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i
184b3(nyi khri): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
184b4(nyi khri): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
184b5(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/ rtog pa
184b6(nyi khri): dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs
184b7(nyi khri): su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
184b8(nyi khri): de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa
185a1(nyi khri): btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid
185a2(nyi khri): mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
185a3(nyi khri): cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam
185a4(nyi khri): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam
185a5(nyi khri): shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar
185a6(nyi khri): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du
185a7(nyi khri): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang /
185a8(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
185b1(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
185b2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
185b3(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
185b4(nyi khri): 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
185b5(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
185b6(nyi khri): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
185b7(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes
185b8(nyi khri): bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su gtog pa'i chos rnams/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs
186a1(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
186a2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug
186a3(nyi khri): zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyabs pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de
186a4(nyi khri): dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang /
186a5(nyi khri): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mongs gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun
186a6(nyi khri): mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
186a7(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
186a8(nyi khri): stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas/ chags par mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /
186b1(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' la
186b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po
186b3(nyi khri): zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po
186b4(nyi khri): nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
186b5(nyi khri): ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar
186b6(nyi khri): dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta
186b7(nyi khri): bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la
186b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don tu bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su
187a1(nyi khri): gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /
187a2(nyi khri): de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis
187a3(nyi khri): shes par bya'o/ /bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa
187a4(nyi khri): la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis phung po nas brtsams te pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / bsam
187a5(nyi khri): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
187a6(nyi khri): 'dres pa'i bar bsgrub pa khong du chud pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
187a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /
187a8(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed
187b1(nyi khri): cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub
187b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang du 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don tu yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang / phung po ma lus pa'i
187b3(nyi khri): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes/ thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad
187b4(nyi khri): kyi don tu/ sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis
187b5(nyi khri): nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
187b6(nyi khri): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang
187b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad
187b8(nyi khri): par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po
188a1(nyi khri): che ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang /
188a2(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che
188a3(nyi khri): des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi
188a4(nyi khri): sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /sems des
188a5(nyi khri): sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems
188a6(nyi khri): bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni/ sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su
188a7(nyi khri): 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul
188a8(nyi khri): gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal
188b1(nyi khri): 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes
188b2(nyi khri): bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos
188b3(nyi khri): la mos pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing / mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor
188b4(nyi khri): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
188b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
188b6(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
188b7(nyi khri): spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
188b8(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
189a1(nyi khri): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
189a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la gnas te sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
189a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bar la gnas
189a4(nyi khri): te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
189a5(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan
189a6(nyi khri): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
189a7(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa skyed cig /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po
189a8(nyi khri): dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba
189b1(nyi khri): dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa dang / byang chub gyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par
189b2(nyi khri): bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
189b3(nyi khri): bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems
189b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems
189b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba
189b6(nyi khri): yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing / dmigs
189b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar
189b8(nyi khri): 'byung bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
190a1(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
190a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
190a3(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
190a4(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar
190a5(nyi khri): du dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
190a6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
190a7(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
190a8(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis
190b1(nyi khri): spobs pa bskyed cig / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i
190b2(nyi khri): sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni/ zag pa ma mchis
190b3(nyi khri): shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin
190b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems ma mchis
190b5(nyi khri): pa de la yang chags pa ma mchis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
190b6(nyi khri): sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
190b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
190b8(nyi khri): rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
191a1(nyi khri): pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la/ nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan
191a2(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
191a3(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de
191a4(nyi khri): bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
191a5(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
191a6(nyi khri): ba yang chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang
191a7(nyi khri): chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cing / khongs su chud pa med de zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa
191a8(nyi khri): rab 'byor der yang mi zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang /
191b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo
191b2(nyi khri): rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs
191b3(nyi khri): su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs
191b4(nyi khri): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa
191b5(nyi khri): med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
191b6(nyi khri): zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med
191b7(nyi khri): do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin
191b8(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
192a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs
192a2(nyi khri): la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang
192a3(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
192a4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med
192a5(nyi khri): pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang / rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
192a6(nyi khri): rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang /
192a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems/
192a8(nyi khri): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su
192b1(nyi khri): 'gyur ba med do/ /mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
192b2(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa
192b3(nyi khri): bskyed cig / gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg
192b4(nyi khri): pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi
192b5(nyi khri): bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang
192b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don tu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha
192b7(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu
192b8(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad
193a1(nyi khri): kyi don tu bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/
