193a2(nyi khri): sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan
193a3(nyi khri): skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed do/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /
193a4(nyi khri): shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig
193a5(nyi khri): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang
193a6(nyi khri): chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don tu
193a7(nyi khri): go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang
193a8(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
193b1(nyi khri): bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
193b2(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rnam par thar
193b3(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
193b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas
193b5(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems skyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //
193b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod
193b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa
193b8(nyi khri): ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
194a1(nyi khri): pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
194a2(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa
194a3(nyi khri): yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
194a4(nyi khri): chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /
194a5(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa
194a6(nyi khri): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
194a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa
194a8(nyi khri): gcig pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
194b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
194b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa yang
194b3(nyi khri): mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs par/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs
194b4(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/
194b5(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan
194b6(nyi khri): mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po
194b7(nyi khri): bgos par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
194b8(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs
195a1(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
195a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos
195a3(nyi khri): pa mi skyed na so so'i skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /
195a4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /
195a5(nyi khri): chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
195a6(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa
195a7(nyi khri): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
195a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing /
195b1(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
195b2(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
195b3(nyi khri): la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrim
195b4(nyi khri): des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
195b5(nyi khri): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang
195b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
195b7(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
195b8(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
196a1(nyi khri): bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
196a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul
196a3(nyi khri): khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
196a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol
196a5(nyi khri): du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol
196a6(nyi khri): du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
196a7(nyi khri): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
196a8(nyi khri): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
196b1(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
196b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan
196b3(nyi khri): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i
196b4(nyi khri): 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa la mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
196b5(nyi khri): pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi
196b6(nyi khri): byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
196b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa
196b8(nyi khri): yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
197a1(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
197a2(nyi khri): spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
197a3(nyi khri): thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
197a4(nyi khri): du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
197a5(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
197a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
197a7(nyi khri): la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing
197a8(nyi khri): brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
197b1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/
197b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
197b3(nyi khri): chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/
197b4(nyi khri): brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
197b5(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'
197b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
197b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
197b8(nyi khri): gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i
198a1(nyi khri): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi
198a2(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan
198a3(nyi khri): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang
198a4(nyi khri): thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
198a5(nyi khri): pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
198a6(nyi khri): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
198a7(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
198a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /
198b1(nyi khri): brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
198b2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin
198b3(nyi khri): pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la/ sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go
198b4(nyi khri): mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
198b5(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa
198b6(nyi khri): la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad
198b7(nyi khri): dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha
198b8(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can
199a1(nyi khri): dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan
199a2(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad
199a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
199a4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
199a5(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
199a6(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
199a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
199a8(nyi khri): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar
199b1(nyi khri): bzod pa la gnas shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
199b2(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
199b3(nyi khri): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas te/ bla na
199b4(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan
199b5(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
199b6(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
199b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
199b8(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
200a1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
200a2(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems
200a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
200a4(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol du phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha
200a5(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
200a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa de
200a7(nyi khri): dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
200a8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
200b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/
200b2(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen
200b3(nyi khri): po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po
200b4(nyi khri): bgos pa la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
200b5(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di
200b6(nyi khri): lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad de/ dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam
200b7(nyi khri): gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
200b8(nyi khri): ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang
201a1(nyi khri): bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la
201a2(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms
201a3(nyi khri): pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang
201a4(nyi khri): snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
201a5(nyi khri): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang /
201a6(nyi khri): mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
201a7(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
201a8(nyi khri): chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis
201b1(nyi khri): tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
201b2(nyi khri): ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med
201b3(nyi khri): pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas
201b4(nyi khri): dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam
201b5(nyi khri): gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes
201b6(nyi khri): med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
201b7(nyi khri): snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing / 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la/ rnam par
201b8(nyi khri): 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa'
202a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam
202a2(nyi khri): par ldang yang / 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/ /
202a3(nyi khri): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe
202a4(nyi khri): 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to snyam du sems shing / yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub
202a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
202a6(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
202a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
202a8(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi
202b1(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi
202b2(nyi khri): pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
202b3(nyi khri): rnam pa rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
202b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
202b5(nyi khri): po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa
202b6(nyi khri): bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
202b7(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
202b8(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
203a1(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin
203a2(nyi khri): la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes/ de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying
203a3(nyi khri): brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
203a4(nyi khri): gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub
203a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par
203a6(nyi khri): nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang
203a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
203a8(nyi khri): 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa'
203b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par
203b2(nyi khri): spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
203b3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag
203b4(nyi khri): gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
203b5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /
203b6(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med
203b7(nyi khri): par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang
203b8(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thegs pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
204a1(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
204a2(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub
204a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bas shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag pa dang / bde ba
204a4(nyi khri): dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
204a5(nyi khri): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ye shes mi
204a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dus gsum la ye shes mi 'jug pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
204a7(nyi khri): po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
204a8(nyi khri): su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
204b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi
204b2(nyi khri): byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas
204b3(nyi khri): pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
204b4(nyi khri): po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
204b5(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/
204b6(nyi khri): len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshul
204b7(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
204b8(nyi khri): phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i
205a1(nyi khri): chos kyang mi dmigs shing / shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang
205a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
205a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
205a4(nyi khri): la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
205a5(nyi khri): don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa'i
205a6(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
205a7(nyi khri): bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs
205a8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
205b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/
205b2(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
205b3(nyi khri): par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgom
205b4(nyi khri): mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
205b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs
205b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mig
205b7(nyi khri): ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
205b8(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad
206a1(nyi khri): do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dmigs
206a2(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi
206a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i
206a4(nyi khri): phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags
206a5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid
206a6(nyi khri): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
206a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di
206a8(nyi khri): ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang
206b1(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /zhes bya bar
206b2(nyi khri): yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
206b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom
206b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs
206b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas
206b6(nyi khri): kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /
206b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa
206b8(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang /
207a1(nyi khri): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro/ /de bla na med
207a2(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /
207a3(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams
207a4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
207a5(nyi khri): kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
207a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes
207a7(nyi khri): grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/
207a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so/ /go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
207b1(nyi khri): bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha chen po
207b2(nyi khri): gyon cing / 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab
207b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha
207b4(nyi khri): bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
207b5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs gyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs
207b6(nyi khri): pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong
207b7(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang /
207b8(nyi khri): lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu
208a1(nyi khri): skyod de/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og
208a2(nyi khri): dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig
208a3(nyi khri): yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag
208a4(nyi khri): kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang / bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
208a5(nyi khri): gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o/ /de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par
208a6(nyi khri): ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /
208a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi
208a8(nyi khri): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur te/ de nas sprul pa
208b1(nyi khri): de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i
208b2(nyi khri): mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
208b3(nyi khri): de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams/ ngan
208b4(nyi khri): song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis/ de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab
208b5(nyi khri): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la
208b6(nyi khri): gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba/ mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar bai dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul par
208b7(nyi khri): byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ me tog
208b8(nyi khri): 'dod pa rnams la me tog / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnam la
209a1(nyi khri): 'tsho ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la/ rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang /
209a2(nyi khri): gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar
209a3(nyi khri): zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gis
209a4(nyi khri): kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/
209a5(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo
209a6(nyi khri): byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
209a7(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i
209a8(nyi khri): bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems
209b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / ched du bsams te/
209b2(nyi khri): skye bo yongs su bzung bas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing / de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam
209b3(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
209b4(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jig
209b5(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
209b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/ chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i
209b7(nyi khri): bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad
209b8(nyi khri): kyi bar la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas
210a1(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
210a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang
210a3(nyi khri): de dag la bkod pa med do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
210a4(nyi khri): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcwa lnga pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
210a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
210a6(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
210a7(nyi khri): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pas rdeg cing / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi
210a8(nyi khri): bya'o/ /zhes go cha gyon cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/

210b2(nyi khri): du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /

210b8(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ /'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/

211b1(nyi khri): yin te/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang / 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par bskul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par

211b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab
211b8(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul shing gzhog go/ /'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes
212a1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang
212a2(nyi khri): skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
212a3(nyi khri): pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go/ /'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
212a4(nyi khri): po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par
